text: Georges Benjamin Clemenceau (September 28, 1841 – November 24, 1929) was a French statesman, physician, and journalist. He also helped Émile Zola defending Alfred Dreyfus against Dreyfus Affair. Category:1841 births Category:1929 deaths Category:French people of World War I Category:Prime ministers of France Category:Politicians from Pays de la Loire Category:People from Vendée
title: Georges Clemenceau
